title: Rebecca's Lost Journals, Volume 4: My Master
description: An Inside Out novella...The secret life of Rebecca and the men who have seduced her. These are the journals Sara never sees, but you the reader, will!The Inside Out Trilogy includes IF I WERE YOU, BEING ME, and REVEALING US In part one of Rebeccaâ€™s Lost Journals, The Seduction, Rebecca meets the rich, darkly alluring man who will draw her into a passionate, intense affair and tempt her into erotic experiences she never thought she would dare.**
author: Lisa Renee Jones
